name: Outer Snake
description:
Outer Snake: Play as a snake in zero gravity, with a powerful tail that you'll probably end up using to accidentally kill yourself. Navigate through the galaxy, fighting off enemies that are probably just programmed to move in a straight line and avoiding obstacles that you'll probably still end up running into.

 Despite its rough edges and amateurish design, Outer Snake is a game that will keep you entertained for hours, or at least for a few minutes until you give up and go play something better.

Planned Updates:

  1. AUDIO 
  2. better art

Version: 1.1

Made By: Fluffyfuffy
